item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, September 9, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. ESPN AI-generated recap of retiring player's final match fails to mention them (161 points | 106 comments)
2. Project Hammer: reduce collusion in the Canadian grocery sector (24 points | 7 comments)
3. Launch HN: Deepsilicon (YC S24) – Software and hardware for ternary transformers (23 points | 3 comments)
4. Why GitHub Won (85 points | 64 comments)
5. Hacking misconfigured AWS S3 buckets: A complete guide (34 points | 5 comments)
6. Study shows 'alarming' level of trust in AI for life and death decisions (23 points | 8 comments)
7. Why I Wrote Data Science for Crime Analysis with Python (46 points | 4 comments)
8. Nobody Cares About Security (41 points | 29 comments)
9. Synthetic diamonds are now purer, more beautiful, and cheaper than mined (68 points | 25 comments)
10. Show HN: Io_uring for Ruby (50 points | 11 comments)
11. QUIC is not quick enough over fast internet (575 points | 264 comments)
12. Smartphone Tethering: A Bigger Grind Than It Needed to Be (16 points | 10 comments)
13. DuckDB 1.1.0 Released (59 points | 7 comments)
14. Show HN: I mapped HN's favorite books with GPT-4o (55 points | 17 comments)
15. ReMamba: Equip Mamba with Effective Long-Sequence Modeling (14 points | 1 comment)
16. College Pulse (YC S18) Is Hiring ( | hide)
17. Paper types ranked by likelihood of paper cuts (41 points | 11 comments)
18. Lessons learnt building a real-time audio application in Python (13 points | 8 comments)
19. Oxygene: A modern language built on the foundation of Object Pascal (14 points | 9 comments)
20. The short history of global living conditions and why it matters that we know it (77 points | 85 comments)
21. 20% more powerful perovskite solar panels enter commercial use (49 points | 51 comments)
22. A tiny self-remaking C program (86 points | 24 comments)
23. A Pipeline Made of Airbags (165 points | 34 comments)
24. Design Patterns Are Temporary, Language Features Are Forever (34 points | 19 comments)
25. Tempted by the Dark Side, I now have a Commodore 128 (31 points | 9 comments)
26. EU competitiveness: Looking ahead [pdf] (27 points | 19 comments)
27. Sleep duration, chronotype, health and lifestyle factors affect cognition [pdf] (248 points | 165 comments)
28. Creating a Git Commit: The Hard Way (267 points | 35 comments)
29. Show HN: Open Message Format – a compact, vendor-agnostic spec for messages (10 points | 5 comments)
30. The U.S. needs to pay more attention to electronic warfare (20 points | 4 comments)
